titles.title: A resolution to pay a gratuity to Robinnia Grace Elaine Richardson.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 328.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/24/1987--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay a gratuity to the surviving spouse of a deceased employee of the Architect of the Capitol assigned to duty on the Senate side at the time of his death.
